channel.title: vladcampos Blog
channel.description: Thoughts and articles from one enthusiast to another.

item.title: Things you should know about Obsidian Publish —my struggles and how I'm dealing with them.
item.description: Obsidian Publish has been a game-changer for my online presence, but like any powerful tool, it comes with its quirks. Here are the hurdles I’ve faced and how I’m jumping them.
